name: Brad | Chest of drawers
description: An object that strikes a balance between modernity and tradition, form and material. The Brad chest of drawers, designed by the CC studio in 2010, furnishes the bedroom with an 'atemporal' style that goes beyond passing trends. Featuring minimalist design, formal balance, and quality solid American walnut, it is truly a timeless classic. Available with six or eight drawers, it comes in four different wood finishes to ensure a personal touch.
